maqras.text: Ate asim isa tom pahilam ibarahima nu maraga darasana pradana kita. Asim usa nu cagi tar'ham janade si
Jadom usa ne apane pita ate apani kauma nu kiha ki iha kihari'am murati'am hana jinham ute tusim tike baithe ho
Unham ne kiha ki asim apane pi'u dadi'am nu inham di hi puja karade ho'e dekhi'a hai
Ibarahima ne kiha, ki besaka tusim ate tuhade pi'u dhade khul'hi gumarahi vica phase rahe
Unham ne kiha ki tusim sade kola saci'am galam li'a'e ho jam tusim makhaula kara rahe ho
Ibarahima ne kiha, sagom tuhada raba uha hai, jihara dharati ate akasam da palanahara hai ate jisa ne inham nu paida kita hai. Maim isa gala di gavahi dena vali'am vicom ham
Ate alaha di sahu, maim tuhadi'am murati'am de sabadha vica ika yojana banavanga jadom tusim ithe nahim hovauge
Phira usa ne unham nu tukare tukare kara dita sinham unham de ika vade tom ilava tam jo uha usa vala puchana la'i dhi'ana dena
Unham ne kiha ki sadi'am murati'am nala ajiha kisa ne kita hai. Besaka uha bara vada zalima hai
Lokam ne kiha ki asim ika naujavana nu unham bare kujha kahidi'am suni'am si, jisanu ibarahima kiha janda hai
Unham ne kiha ki usa nu sare lokam de sahamane hazira karom tam jo usa nu puchi'a jave
Unham ne kiha he ibarahima! Ki sade pujakam de nala tusim ajiha iha kita hai
Ibarahima ne kiha, sagom unham de usa vade ne ajiha kita hai tam usa nu pucha la'u jekara iha bolada hove
Phira unham ne apane mana vica soci'a ate uha apasa vica ika dusare nu kahina lage ki asala vica apam hi jhutha upara ham
Phira (unham ne) apane siram nu jhuka li'a. He ibarahima! Tusi' janade ho ki iha bolade nahim
Ibarahima ne kiha, ki tusim alaha tom binham ajihi'am cizam di puja karade hom jihari'am na tuhanu ko'i labha pahuca sakadi'am hana ate na hani
Afasosa hai tuhade upara vi ate inham cizam (butam) upara vi jinham di tusim alaha tom binham puja karade ho. Ki tusim samajhade nahim
Unham ne kiha ki isa nu aga vica jala devo ate apane pujakam di madada karom, jekara tusim kujha karana cahude ho
Asim kiha hai aga! Tu ibarahima la'i thadi, santa ate surakhi'ata bana ja
Ate unham ne usa nala bura'i karani cahi tam asim' unham lokam nu asafala bana dita
Ate asim usa nu ate luta nu baca ke usa dharati vala lai ga'e jisa vica asim sasara vali'am la'i barakatam rakhi'am hana
Ate asim_usa nu isahaka dita ate nala hi yakuba. Ate asim inham sari'am nu sadacari sana'i'a
Ate asim unham nu na'ika bana'i'a jihare sade hukama nala maraga darasana karade si. Asim unham nu cage kama, namaza ate zakata ada karana da hukama bheji'a ate uha sadi ibadata karana vale sana
Ate luta nu asim bibeka ate gi'ana bakhasi'a. Ate usa nu usa basati tom mukati diti jisa de loka baî€¼ure kama karade sana. Besaka uha bahuta baî€¼ure ate duracari loka sana
Ate asim usa nu apani rahimata vica dakhila kita, besaka uha bhale lokam vicom si
Ate nuha nu jadom isa tom pahilam usa ne pukari'a tam asim usa di benati savikara kiti. Tam asim usa nu ate usa de lokam nu bahuta vade dukham tom mukati diti
Ate unham lokam de mukabale vica usa di saha'ita kiti jinham ne sadi'am nisani'am tom inakara kita. Besaka uha bahuta bure loka si. Tam hi asim unham sari'am nu dabom dita

Ate da'uda ate sulemana nu jadom uha dovem kheti de sabadha vica phaisala kara rahe si, jadom usa vica kujha lokam di'am bakari'am rata de samem (kheta) vica ja pa'i'am ate asi' usa de isa faisale nu dekha rahe si

Tam asim sulemana nu isa di samajha diti. Ate asim donvam nu bibeka ate gi'ana dita si. Ate asim da'uda de adhina kara dita paharam nu, uha usa de nala apane raba di sifata karade si ate pachi'am nu vi ate asim hi karana vale si
Ate asim usa nu tuhade la'i ika yudha basatara bana'una da hunara sikha'i'a tam ki uha tuhanu yudha vica surakhi'ata rakhe phira ki tusi' sukara karana vale banade ho
Ate asim sulemana la'i teja hava nu vasa vica kara dita jihari usa de hukama nala usa khetara vala caladi si jisa vica asim barakatam rakhi'am sana. Ate asim hareka ciza nu janana vale ham
Ate saitanam vicom vi asim usa da agi'akari bana dita jihare usa la'i cubhi la'unde si. Ate isa tom' binham duje kama karade si ate asim' hi usa nu sabhalana vale si
